ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Whisk pudding mix and milk until thickened, about 2 minutes
Fold in whipped topping gently to maintain lightness
Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is the quickest mousse recipe. How long does it take to come together?
